title: Awesome List Updates on Oct 05, 2024

items.title: Awesome Angular
items.content_text:
### YouTube Channels / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [JSgigs](https://www.youtube.com/@jsgigs4909)

### Integrations / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [gong (‚≠ê14)](https://github.com/fullstack-lang/gong) - Gong (go + ng) is a framework for full stack development based on Go and Angular. The Go back-end uses gin, gorm, and sqlite (a pure go sqlite, no cgo needed). The Angular front-end uses Angular Material.

### Server-Side Rendering / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [analog-stuff (‚≠ê3)](https://github.com/joshuamorony/analog-stuff) - Extra stuff for AnalogJS including `agx-remark-rehype`.

### Mixed utilities / [Google Developer Experts](https://developers.google.com/experts/all/technology/web-technologies)

*   [firestitch](https://github.com/orgs/Firestitch/repositories) - [Firestitch](https://firestitch.com/) has a ton of open source Angular solutions.

items.title: Awesome Agi Cocosci
items.content_text:
### Theory of Mind / AI Assisted Research

*   [Evaluating and Modeling Social Intelligence: A Comparative Study of Human and AI Capabilities](https://escholarship.org/uc/item/2j53v5nv) - ***CogSci'24***, 2024. \[[All Versions](https://scholar.google.com/scholar?cluster=902767361177896884)]. This work eveloped a comprehensive theoretical framework for social dynamics and introduced two evaluation tasks: Inverse Reasoning (IR) and Inverse Inverse Planning (IIP). The approach also encompassed a computational model based on recursive Bayesian inference, adept at elucidating diverse human behavioral patterns. Extensive experiments and detailed analyses revealed that humans surpassed the latest GPT models in overall performance, zero-shot learning, one-shot generalization, and adaptability to multi-modalities.
items.content_html:
Theory of Mind / AI Assisted Research

  • Evaluating and Modeling Social Intelligence: A Comparative Study of Human and AI Capabilities - CogSci'24, 2024. [All Versions]. This work eveloped a comprehensive theoretical framework for social dynamics and introduced two evaluation tasks: Inverse Reasoning (IR) and Inverse Inverse Planning (IIP). The approach also encompassed a computational model based on recursive Bayesian inference, adept at elucidating diverse human behavioral patterns. Extensive experiments and detailed analyses revealed that humans surpassed the latest GPT models in overall performance, zero-shot learning, one-shot generalization, and adaptability to multi-modalities.

items.title: Awesome Godot
items.content_text:
### 2D / Godot 4

*   [Librerama](https://codeberg.org/Yeldham/librerama) - A free/libre fast-paced arcade collection of mini-games.
*   [Unknown Horizons (‚≠ê769)](https://github.com/unknown-horizons/godot-port) - Official work-in-progress reimplementation of Unknown Horizons.

### 2D / Godot 3

*   [Breakable (‚≠ê63)](https://github.com/didier-v/breakable) - A breakout-like game.
*   [ROTA (‚≠ê269)](https://github.com/HarmonyHoney/ROTA) - Gravity-bending puzzle platformer game.

### 3D / Godot 4

*   [Super Tux Party](https://gitlab.com/SuperTuxParty/SuperTuxParty) - A free/libre and open-source party game that is meant to replicate the feel of games such as Mario Party.
*   [Tanks of Freedom II (‚≠ê317)](https://github.com/P1X-in/Tanks-of-Freedom-3-D) - Free turn-based isometric strategy game in voxel art.

### Projects / Godot 4

*   [Lorien (‚≠ê6k)](https://github.com/mbrlabs/Lorien) - Infinite-canvas drawing/whiteboarding app for Windows, Linux and macOS. Supports drawing tablets and pressure sensitivity.
*   [Pixelorama (‚≠ê8.3k)](https://github.com/Orama-Interactive/Pixelorama) - 2D pixel art editor.
*   [ProtonGraph (‚≠ê1.5k)](https://github.com/protongraph/protongraph) - Node-based tool for procedural content creation. Like visual scripting, but for 3D model generation (needs custom engine modules).

### Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

*   [Shaker (‚≠ê349)](https://github.com/Eneskp3441/Shaker) - Plugin that adds shaking and emitters for cameras, nodes or any property in 2D and 3D.
items.content_html:
2D / Godot 4

  • Librerama - A free/libre fast-paced arcade collection of mini-games.
  • Unknown Horizons (‚≠ê769) - Official work-in-progress reimplementation of Unknown Horizons.

2D / Godot 3

  • Breakable (‚≠ê63) - A breakout-like game.
  • ROTA (‚≠ê269) - Gravity-bending puzzle platformer game.

3D / Godot 4

  • Super Tux Party - A free/libre and open-source party game that is meant to replicate the feel of games such as Mario Party.
  • Tanks of Freedom II (‚≠ê317) - Free turn-based isometric strategy game in voxel art.

Projects / Godot 4

  • Lorien (‚≠ê6k) - Infinite-canvas drawing/whiteboarding app for Windows, Linux and macOS. Supports drawing tablets and pressure sensitivity.
  • Pixelorama (‚≠ê8.3k) - 2D pixel art editor.
  • ProtonGraph (‚≠ê1.5k) - Node-based tool for procedural content creation. Like visual scripting, but for 3D model generation (needs custom engine modules).

Plugins and scripts / Godot 4

  • Shaker (‚≠ê349) - Plugin that adds shaking and emitters for cameras, nodes or any property in 2D and 3D.
